sentences.sContent: He would rather die than dicker over prices.
sentences.sContent_eng: He would rather die than dicker over prices.
sentences.sCn: 他宁愿死也不愿意讨价还价。

sentences.sContent: I learned that this dealership (like all Saturn dealerships) has a "no-dicker sticker" policy; that is, the price on the window is the price you pay for the car.
sentences.sContent_eng: I learned that this dealership (like all Saturn dealerships) has a "no-dicker sticker" policy; that is, the price on the window is the price you pay for the car.
sentences.sCn: 我了解到这家代理商（像所有土星汽车代理商一样）有一个“坚决不接受还价”策略，就是说，贴在车窗上的标价就是最终卖价。

synos.tran: 易货；[贸易]做小生意；讨价还价

trans.tranOther: to argue about or discuss the details of a sale, agreement etc
